info.title: DEED OF GIFT (OF IMMOVABLE PROPERTY)
legal_concepts: POSSESSION: The DONOR has on the date of execution of this Deed, handed over the vacant, peaceful, and physical possession of the said Property to the DONEE, and the DONEE acknowledges receipt of the same

DEED OF GIFT (OF IMMOVABLE PROPERTY)
THIS DEED OF GIFT is made and executed on this 22nd day of August, 2025 at Mumbai
IRREVOCABILITY: The DONOR declares that this Deed of Gift is irrevocable and that he shall have no right, title, or interest in the said Property hereafter

NOW THIS DEED WITNESSETH AS FOLLOWS:
TRANSFER OF GIFT: In consideration of his natural love and affection for the DONEE, the DONOR does hereby give, grant, convey, and transfer unto the DONEE, absolutely and forever, the said Property along with all rights, title, interest, easements, and privileges appurtenant thereto, TO HAVE AND TO HOLD the same unto the DONEE as her absolute property
501, on the 5th Floor, in the building known as 'Sapphire Heights' Cooperative Housing Society, situated at Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri (West), Mumbai - 400053, admeasuring 950 sq

Anjali Gupta)
WITNESSES:
(This Deed of Gift must be attested by at least two witnesses)
WIT-NESS 1:
Signature:
Name: Vijay Sharma
Address: 502, Sapphire Heights, Andheri, Mumbai
WITNESS 2:
Signature:
Name: Priya Singh
Address: 601, Sapphire Heights, Andheri, Mumbai

Suresh Gupta, aged 68 years, residing at 12B, Palkhivala House, Marine Drive, Mumbai - 400020, India (hereinafter referred to as the ‚ÄúDONOR‚Äù, which expression shall unless repugnant to the context mean and include his legal heirs, executors, and administrators)

Ramesh Gupta, aged 35 years, residing at 12B, Palkhivala House, Marine Drive, Mumbai - 400020, India (hereinafter referred to as the ‚ÄúDONEE‚Äù, which expression shall unless repugnant to the context mean and include her legal heirs, executors, and administrators)

final.summary:
DEED OF GIFT (OF IMMOVABLE PROPERTY) ‚Äì Simplified Summary

1. Parties involved:
o Mr. Ramesh Gupta
o Mr. Suresh Gupta
o Mr. Ramesh Gupta
o Mr. Ramesh Gupta
2. Obligations of the Receiving Party:
o Keep the information in strict confidence and protect it like its own confidential data.
o Not share it with any third party without the written consent of the Disclosing Party.
o Use it only for the Purpose and nothing else.
o Share it only with employees, directors, advisors, or consultants who need to know, provided they also follow confidentiality obligations.
3. Term: This Agreement is effective for 68 years from the Effective Date.
4. Confidentiality obligations continue for 35 years after termination.
5. No rights or licenses (patents, copyrights, trademarks, or IP) are granted under this Agreement.
6. The DONEE is the sole and absolute owner of the residential flat, residing at 12B, Palkhivala House, Marine Drive, Mumbai - 400020, India (hereinafter referred to as the ‚ÄúDONOR‚Äù), which expression shall unless repugnant to the context mean and include his legal heirs, executors and administrators.
7. The DONEE is the sole and absolute owner of the residential flat being Flat No.
8. All parties involved with COMPLETE names, titles, addresses, and relationships 2.
9. All dates, amounts, durations and financial details mentioned 3.

info.title: DEED OF GIFT (OF IMMOVABLE PROPERTY)
legal_concepts: The DONOR is the sole and absolute owner of the residential flat being Flat No
The DONOR further declares that the said Property is free from all encumbrances, liens, mortgages, charges, or court attachments

Ramesh Gupta)
DONEE:
(Ms
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have set their hands on this Deed of Gift on the day, month, and year first above written
The DONEE has signified her acceptance of the gift of the said Property from the DONOR
The DONEE is the daughter of the DONOR, and the DONOR holds great natural love and affection for the DONEE

FUTURE OBLIGATIONS: The DONEE shall henceforth be solely responsible for the payment of all property taxes, society maintenance charges, utility bills, and any other dues or outgoings in respect of the said Property
carpet area, along with one car parking space (hereinafter collectively referred to as the ‚Äúsaid Property‚Äù)
ASSURANCE OF TITLE: The DONOR hereby covenants with the DONEE that he is the absolute owner of the said Property and has the full right and authority to make this gift
VALUATION: The market value of the said Property is estimated to be ‚Çπ2,50,00,000/- (Rupees Two Crore Fifty Lakh only)
The requisite stamp duty as applicable for a gift to a close relative in Maharashtra has been paid on this instrument

The DONOR, out of his own free will and volition, and in consideration of his natural love and affection for the DONEE, is desirous of gifting the said Property to the DONEE without any monetary consideration

POSSESSION: The DONOR has on the date of execution of this Deed, handed over the vacant, peaceful, and physical possession of the said Property to the DONEE, and the DONEE acknowledges receipt of the same
